title: A SIMPLE WAY TO CREATE AN OUTDOOR STORAGE SPACE

tasks.task: Install storage for tractor tools to prevent weed growth and improve accessibility.
subtasks: Measure and mark 300 linear feet for storage.
Obtain three rolls of fabric (100-foot each).
Lay down 100-foot rolls of geotextile fabric.
Excavate and prepare the ground for 40 yards of 21 AA.
Ensure the storage area is 10 feet wide.
Evaluate the effectiveness of the storage system.
Solicit opinions on the storage method's success.šík

tasks.task: Install storage for tractor tools to prevent weed growth and improve accessibility.

measuring (so you have to go out there with measuring tape), laying down materials (materials handling and placement), excavating (digging, moving dirt), pouring aggregate, possibly compaction. Then securing the fabric and maybe making sure the area is level. So indeed, quite a bit of manual labor.
Install storage for tractor tools to prevent weed growth and improve accessibility.
